description: This file is a shell script used for configuring GRE tunnels, network interfaces, and related system settings for hotspot devices. It includes variable definitions, system command invocations, configuration functions, and a case statement to execute different setup routines.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper system events by enabling circuit and remote snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves configuration parameters from the PSM database.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates a GRE tunnel and configures associated network interfaces and bridges.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events related to keepalive protocol settings.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Sets iptables rules for forwarding and NFQUEUE configuration.

calls: ip link add gretap0 type gretap remote `sysevent get hotspotfd-tunnelEP` local "`ifconfig -a eth0 | grep inet | grep -v inet6 | tr -s " " | cut -d ":" -f2 | cut -d " " -f1`" ttl 255 dev $WAN_IF
